alert.note: Alert for Brunswick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:21AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...River Flooding is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Virginia, including the following county, Brunswick. * WHEN...Until noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding is expected to occur along the Meherrin River at Lawrenceville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 517 AM EST, the Meherrin River at Lawrenceville continues to rise after recent heavy rainfall. The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 20.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - For Meherrin River at Lawrenceville: At 4:45am the stage was 12.19 feet. Flood Stage is 15.0 feet. Forecast: A crest of 20.2 feet is expected at 7:00pm Monday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
